keyword: how many calories are in a four loko
title: How Many Calories Are in a Four Loko?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a Four Loko, including carbs, sugars, alcohol content, and nutrition breakdowns for this popular energy drink.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Four Loko?
assumptions: Standard 23.5 oz (695 ml) can, fruit punch flavor; carbonated malt beverage with alcohol, caffeine, and taurine; no added mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, size, and serving; alcohol content affects calorie count. Check labels and drink responsibly.

quick_answer.text: One standard Four Loko can contains about 660 kcal, mostly from alcohol and sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to a lower-sugar flavor like sour apple
Pour over ice (dilutes slightly, assumes half volume consumed)
Choose the 12 oz slim can version

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Four Loko can?
faqs.a: Approximately 660 kcal for a standard 23.5 oz can.

faqs.q: Does Four Loko have a lot of sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, about 81 g of sugars per can, contributing to the high calorie count.

faqs.q: What's the alcohol content in Four Loko?
faqs.a: Typically 12-14% ABV, which adds significant calories from alcohol.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in Four Loko?
faqs.a: Around 81 g of carbs per can, all from sugars with no fiber.

faqs.q: How do calories vary by Four Loko flavor?
faqs.a: Most flavors are similar at 600-700 kcal, but lower-sugar options may be slightly less.
